description:
This market will resolve to “Yes” if ESPN becomes available on DirecTV again between September 8, 2024, 11:00 AM ET and the beginning of Falcons vs. Eagles (currently scheduled to begin on September 16, 8:15 PM ET). Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

If an agreement is announced that ESPN will be available again on DirecTV before the start of Falcons vs. Eagles, it will qualify for a "Yes" resolution only if ESPN is broadly back for most DirecTV customers before the game - if the agreement goes into effect after the beginning of the game, it will resolve to "No".

The beginning of the game is defined as when the first snap occurs.

The primary resolution source for this market will be information from The Walt Disney Company, DirecTV, LLC, and/or their subsidiaries, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

events.title: ESPN back on DirecTV before Falcons vs. Eagles?

question: ESPN back on DirecTV before Falcons vs. Eagles?
